source_caption_data.pre_caption:
This is a stunning night-time shot of the Place Vendôme in Paris, with the iconic Vendôme Column as the central focus. The column is dramatically illuminated with a cool, greenish-blue light, standing in contrast to the warm, golden glow from the windows of the elegant surrounding buildings. Ornate street lamps cast bright, starburst-like light across the square.

The camera performs a slow, upward tilting motion, gradually emphasizing the height and grandeur of the monument against the dark night sky.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption:
This is a stunning night-time shot of the Place Vendôme in Paris, with the iconic Vendôme Column as the central focus. The column is dramatically illuminated with a cool, greenish-blue light, standing in contrast to the warm, golden glow from the windows of the elegant surrounding buildings. Ornate street lamps cast bright, starburst-like light across the square.

The camera performs a slow, upward tilting motion, gradually emphasizing the height and grandeur of the monument against the dark night sky.

generated_critique: The camera also briefly pans to the left before continuing its slow, upward tilting motion, gradually emphasizing the height and grandeur of the monument against the dark night sky.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a stunning night-time shot of the Place Vendôme in Paris, with the iconic Vendôme Column as the central focus. The column is dramatically illuminated with a cool, greenish-blue light, standing in contrast to the warm, golden glow from the windows of the elegant surrounding buildings. Ornate street lamps cast bright, starburst-like light across the square. The camera briefly pans to the left before continuing its slow, upward tilting motion, gradually emphasizing the height and grandeur of the monument against the dark night sky.
